name: recipeorganiser
0:
”Alexa, open recipe organiser and add a recipe”
”Alexa, open recipe organiser and get a recipe”
”Alexa, open recipe organiser and delete a recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recipe organiser
des: Using this skill, the user can add a recipe, delete a recipe, look for a specific recipe and list all recipes. The user can store their recipes in specific locations and find them later.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
